info.description: REST API for Azure Spring Cloud
info.title: AppPlatformManagementClient

get.description: Lists all of the available REST API operations of the Microsoft.AppPlatform provider.

200.description: Success. The response describes the list of operations.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Handles requests to list all resources in a subscription.

200.description: Success. The response describes the list of Services in the subscription.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Checks that the resource name is valid and is not already in use.

200.description: Success. The response describes the name availability.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Handles requests to list all resources in a resource group.

200.description: Success. The response describes the list of Services in the resource group.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

202.description: Accepted. The response indicates the delete operation is performed in the background.

204.description: Success. The response indicates the resource is already deleted.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get a Service and its properties.

200.description: Success. The response describes the corresponding Service.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Operation to update an exiting Service.

200.description: Success. The response describes the updated Service.

202.description: Accepted. The response indicates the exiting Service is now updating and contains a Location header to query the operation result.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Create a new Service or update an exiting Service.

requestBody.description: Parameters for the create or update operation

200.description: Success. The response describes the updated Service.

201.description: Created. The response describes the new Service and contains a Location header to query the operation result.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Handles requests to list all resources in a Service.

200.description: Success. The response describes the list of Apps in the Service.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: Success. The response indicates the resource is deleted.

204.description: Success. The response indicates the resource doesn't exist.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get an App and its properties.

200.description: Success. The response describes the corresponding App.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Operation to update an exiting App.

200.description: Success. The response describes the updated App.

202.description: Accepted. The response indicates the exiting App is now updating and contains a Location header to query the operation result.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Create a new App or update an exiting App.

requestBody.description: Parameters for the create or update operation

200.description: Success. The response describes the updated App.

201.description: Created. The response describes the new App and contains a Location header to query the operation result.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Handles requests to list all resources in an App.

200.description: Success. The response describes the list of Bindings in the App.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: Success. The response indicates the resource is deleted.

204.description: Success. The response indicates the resource doesn't exist.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get a Binding and its properties.

200.description: Success. The response describes the corresponding Binding.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Operation to update an exiting Binding.

200.description: Success. The response describes the updated Binding.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Create a new Binding or update an exiting Binding.

requestBody.description: Parameters for the create or update operation

200.description: Success. The response describes the created or updated Binding.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Handles requests to list all resources in an App.

parameters.description: Version of the deployments to be listed
parameters.name: version

200.description: Success. The response describes the list of Deployments in the App.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: Success. The response indicates the resource is deleted.

204.description: Success. The response indicates the resource doesn't exist.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get a Deployment and its properties.

200.description: Success. The response describes the corresponding Deployment.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Operation to update an exiting Deployment.

200.description: Success. The response describes the updated Deployment.

202.description:
Accepted. The response indicates the exiting Deployment is now updating and contains a Location
header to query the operation result.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Create a new Deployment or update an exiting Deployment.

requestBody.description: Parameters for the create or update operation

200.description: Success. The response describes the updated Deployment.

201.description:
Created. The response describes the new Deployment and contains a Location header to query the
operation result.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: Success. The response contains the log file URL.

204.description: Success. The deployment does not have log file.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: Success.

202.description:
Accepted. The response indicates the Deployment is now restarting and contains a Location header
to query the operation result.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: Success.

202.description:
Accepted. The response indicates the Deployment is now starting and contains a Location header to
query the operation result.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: Success.

202.description:
Accepted. The response indicates the Deployment is now stopping and contains a Location header to
query the operation result.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Get an resource upload URL for an App, which may be artifacts or source archive.

200.description: Success. The response describes the resource upload URL.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: List deployments for a certain service

parameters.description: Version of the deployments to be listed
parameters.name: version

200.description: Success

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: Success

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: Success

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: List test keys for a Service.

200.description: Success. The response describes the test keys.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Regenerate a test key for a Service.

200.description: Success.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

display.provider: Microsoft Azure Distributed Managed Service for Spring

AppNameParameter.description: The name of the App resource.
AppNameParameter.name: appName

BindingNameParameter.description: The name of the Binding resource.
BindingNameParameter.name: bindingName

DeploymentNameParameter.description: The name of the Deployment resource.
DeploymentNameParameter.name: deploymentName

ResourceGroupNameParameter.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.
ResourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName

ServiceNameParameter.description: The name of the Service resource.
ServiceNameParameter.name: serviceName

SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Gets subscription ID which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId

AppResourceCollection.description: Object that includes an array of App resources and a possible link for next set

nextLink.description:
URL client should use to fetch the next page (per server side paging).
It's null for now, added for future use.

activeDeploymentName.description: Name of the active deployment of the App

createdTime.description: Date time when the resource is created

public.description: Indicates whether the App exposes public endpoint

nextLink.description:
URL client should use to fetch the next page (per server side paging).
It's null for now, added for future use.

BindingResourceCollection.description: Object that includes an array of Binding resources and a possible link for next set

nextLink.description:
URL client should use to fetch the next page (per server side paging).
It's null for now, added for future use.

bindingParameters.description: Binding parameters of the Binding resource

createdAt.description: Creation time of the Binding resource

generatedProperties.description: The generated Spring Boot property file for this binding. The secret will be deducted.

key.description: The key of the bound resource

resourceId.description: The Azure resource id of the bound resource

resourceName.description: The name of the bound resource

resourceType.description: The standard Azure resource type of the bound resource

updatedAt.description: Update time of the Binding resource

CloudError.description: An error response from the service.

CloudErrorBody.description: An error response from the service.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

details.description: A list of additional details about the error.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

target.description: The target of the particular error. For example, the name of the property in error.

serviceId.description: ServiceInstanceEntity GUID which uniquely identifies a created resource

password.description: Password of git repository basic auth.

privateKey.description: Private sshKey algorithm of git repository.

strictHostKeyChecking.description: Strict host key checking or not.

username.description: Username of git repository basic auth.

discoveryStatus.description: Discovery status of the deployment instance

reason.description: Failed reason of the deployment instance

DeploymentResourceCollection.description: Object that includes an array of App resources and a possible link for next set

nextLink.description:
URL client should use to fetch the next page (per server side paging).
It's null for now, added for future use.

active.description: Indicates whether the Deployment is active

createdTime.description: Date time when the resource is created

instances.description: Collection of instances belong to the Deployment

Error.description: The error code compose of code and message.

password.description: Password of git repository basic auth.

pattern.description: Collection of pattern of the repository

privateKey.description: Private sshKey algorithm of git repository.

strictHostKeyChecking.description: Strict host key checking or not.

username.description: Username of git repository basic auth.

LogSpecification.description: Specifications of the Log for Azure Monitoring

displayName.description: Localized friendly display name of the log

MetricDimension.description: Specifications of the Dimension of metrics

displayName.description: Localized friendly display name of the dimension

MetricSpecification.description: Specifications of the Metrics for Azure Monitoring

aggregationType.description: Only provide one value for this field. Valid values: Average, Minimum, Maximum, Total, Count.

category.description: Name of the metric category that the metric belongs to. A metric can only belong to a single category.

displayDescription.description: Localized friendly description of the metric

displayName.description: Localized friendly display name of the metric

fillGapWithZero.description: Optional. If set to true, then zero will be returned for time duration where no metric is emitted/published.

unit.description: Unit that makes sense for the metric

message.description: Message why the name is not available

nameAvailable.description: Indicates whether the name is available

reason.description: Reason why the name is not available

type.description: Type of the resource to check name availability

dataAction.description: Indicates whether the operation is a data action

description.description: Localized friendly description for the operation

operation.description: Localized friendly name for the operation

mountPath.description: Mount path of the persistent disk

sizeInGB.description: Size of the persistent disk in GB

usedInGB.description: Size of the used persistent disk in GB

ProxyResource.description: The resource model definition for a ARM proxy resource. It will have everything other than required location and tags.

Resource.description: The core properties of ARM resources.

id.description: Fully qualified resource Id for the resource.

ServiceResourceList.description: Object that includes an array of Service resources and a possible link for next set

nextLink.description:
URL client should use to fetch the next page (per server side paging).
It's null for now, added for future use.

logSpecifications.description: Specifications of the Log for Azure Monitoring

metricSpecifications.description: Specifications of the Metrics for Azure Monitoring

mountPath.description: Mount path of the temporary disk

sizeInGB.description: Size of the temporary disk in GB

enabled.description: Indicates whether the test endpoint feature enabled or not
Indicates whether enable the tracing functionality

TrackedResource.description: The resource model definition for a ARM tracked top level resource.

location.description: The GEO location of the resource.

tags.description: Tags of the service which is a list of key value pairs that describe the resource.

artifactSelector.description:
Selector for the artifact to be used for the deployment for multi-module projects. This should be
the relative path to the target module/project.

relativePath.description: Relative path of the storage which stores the source
